main event: An unidentified flying object, described as a large, round, metallic-looking object, was observed hovering and moving down the street in Riverside, California on July 23, 1952.
interesting points: The object was observed for 1 to 3 seconds before disappearing into clouds., It was noted to have a diameter of 122 feet and a bluish-white color., An exhaust trail resembling a comet tail was reported., The object emitted a noise similar to that of a jet aircraft., The observer's reliability is classified as unknown and there were no physical evidence or photographs taken.
sighted object: large round white object with a metallic sheen
witness description: A librarian at the public library in Riverside.
